title: Out System Scout Vessel
wikitext:
'''Out System Scout Vessel'''

'''Type''': Light scout ship

'''Sensors''': *Passive: 30/1D *Scan: 50/2D *Search: 75/2D+2 *Focus: 5/4D '''Weapons''': *Laser Cannon : Fire Arc: Turret
Crew: 1

Fire Control: 1D+2
Space Range: 3-5/15/30
Atmosphere Range: 75200/1/2 km
Damage: 3D+2 '''Capsule''': The Out System Scout Vessel was deployed by the Galactic Empire to be used for finding new planets (it was famously used during the search for a suitable planet with which the Empire could replace its operations on Demophon), although it was originally designed by the Loronar Corporation to serve as a scout ship. One Out System Scout Vessel was captured by the Alliance to Restore the Republic in the Stribos system, by neutralizing it before it could jump to hyperspace.
